TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeTypeReferenceCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Класс предоставляет простой объект коллекции, который можно использовать для хранения набора объектов .The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CodeTypeReferenceCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeReferenceCollection/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CodeTypeReferenceCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeReferenceCollection/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CodeTypeReferenceCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeTypeReferenceCollection/VB/class1.vb#1)]
